generatedTitle: The Lion King Musical: Debut and Success

extractFactDictList.question: When did The Lion King musical first debut?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Lion King musical first debuted on July 8, 1997, at the Orpheum Theatre in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

extractFactDictList.question: Where did The Lion King musical premiere after its instant success?
extractFactDictList.sentence: It was an instant success and later premiered on Broadway at the New Amsterdam Theatre on October 15.
